core.vgdl

Class VGDLSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.vgdl.VGDLSprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Conveyor, Flicker, Immovable, Missile, MovingAvatar, Passive, RandomNPC, SpriteProducer, Walker

    public abstract class VGDLSprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: Diego Date: 17/10/13 Time: 10:59 This is a Java port from Tom Schaul's VGDL - https://github.com/schaul/py-vgdl

      Draws the health bar, as a vertical bar on top (and left) of the sprite.

      Draws the not-oriented part of the sprite, as an image. this.image must be not null.

      In case this sprite is oriented and has an arrow to draw, it draws it.

      Draws the resources hold by this sprite, as an horizontal bar on top of the sprite.

        Indicates if this sprite is a resource.

        public boolean portal
        Indicates if this sprite is a portal.

      • invisible

        public java.lang.String invisible
        Indicates if the sprite is invisible. If it is, the effect is that it is not drawn.

      • hidden

        public java.lang.String hidden
        If true, this sprite is never present in the observations passed to the controller.

        public boolean autotiling
        Indicates if the tile support autotiling

        public double randomtiling
        Indicates if the tile picking is random

        max frameRate for animating sprites

        remaining frame speed

      • currentFrame

        public int currentFrame
        the current frame to be drawn

      • itypes

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> itypes
        List of types this sprite belongs to. It contains the ids, including itself's, from this sprite up in the hierarchy of sprites defined in SpriteSet in the game definition.

      • resources

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> resources
        Indicates the amount of resources this sprite has, for each type defined as its int identifier.

      • images

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image>> images
        All images in case there's orientation changes and/or animations.

        public java.awt.Image image
        Unique and current image of this sprite.

        public java.lang.String img
        String that represents the image in VGDL.

        public java.lang.String orientedImg
        String that represents the image in VGDL.

      • is_npc

        public boolean is_npc
        Indicates if this sprite is an NPC.

      • spriteID

        public int spriteID
        ID of this sprite.

      • is_from_avatar

        public boolean is_from_avatar
        Indicates if this sprite was created by the avatar.

      • bucket

        public int bucket
        Bucket

      • bucketSharp

        public boolean bucketSharp
        Bucket remainder.

      • rotateInPlace

        public boolean rotateInPlace
        Indicates if the sprite is able to rotate in place.

      • isFirstTick

        public boolean isFirstTick
        Indicates if the sprite is in its first cycle of existence. Passive movement is not allowed in the first tick.

      • healthPoints

        public int healthPoints
        Health points of this sprite. It does not automatically kill the sprite when it gets to 0 (an effect must do that, like 'SubtractHealthPoints'). Its default value is set to 0, if not set specifically in VGDL.

      • maxHealthPoints

        public int maxHealthPoints
        Maximum health points of this sprite. If not set specifically in VGDL, the default value is set to the healthPoints value set. This is NOT the maximum possible amount of points, it's the max. ever had.

      • limitHealthPoints

        public int limitHealthPoints
        Limit of health points of this can have. If not set specifically in VGDL, the default value is set to a very high value (1000)

      • timeToLive

        public int timeToLive
        Time to live for this sprite. Default set to -1 will not affect the sprite. If ttl > -1, when it gets to 0, the sprite gets killed.

      • rotation

        public double rotation
        The sprites rotation

      • wMult

        public double wMult
        Multipliers for sprite's rectangle size

      • hMult

        public double hMult

      • size

        public java.awt.Dimension size
        The sprites size

      • on_ground

        public boolean on_ground
        Is the sprite on ground?

      • solid

        public boolean solid
        Is this a SOLID sprite? Meaning, can sprites stand on top of them, triggering the on_ground check.

      • max_speed

        public double max_speed
        Maximum speed of the sprites

        public void updatePassive()
        Updates this sprite applying the passive movement.

      • _updateOrientation

        public boolean _updateOrientation(Direction orientation)
        Updates the orientation of the avatar to match the orientation parameter.
        Parameters:
        orientation - final orientation the avatar must have.
        Returns:
        true if orientation could be changed. This returns false in two circumstances: the avatar is not oriented (is_oriented == false) or the previous orientation is the same as the one received by parameter.

      • _updatePos

        public boolean _updatePos(Direction orientation,
                          int speed)
        Updates the position of the sprite, giving its orientation and speed.
        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation of the sprite.
        speed - the speed of the sprite.
        Returns:
        true if the position changed.

      • _updateRotation

        public boolean _updateRotation(double rot)
        Parameters:
        rot - the rotation of the sprite
        Returns:
        true if rotation could be changed

        public void updateBucket()

        the velocity of the sprite

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if there's a collision.

        public Vector2d getLastPosition()
        Gets the last position of this sprite. Returns null if same as current position.
        Returns:
        the position as a Vector2d.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D gphx,
                 Game game)
        Draws this sprite (both the not oriented and, if appropriate, the oriented part)
        Parameters:
        gphx - graphics object to draw in.
        game - reference to the game that is being played now.

      • groundIntersects

        public boolean groundIntersects(VGDLSprite sp)
        Overwritting intersects to check if we are on ground.
        Returns:
        true if it directly intersects with sp (as in the normal case), but additionally checks for on_ground condition.

      • _drawOriented

        public void _drawOriented(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                          java.awt.Rectangle r)
        In case this sprite is oriented and has an arrow to draw, it draws it.
        Parameters:
        g - graphics device to draw in.

        Parameters:

      • equiv

        public boolean equiv(java.lang.Object o)
        Determines if two the object passed is equal to this. We are NOT overriding EQUALS on purpose (Costly operation for eventHandling).

      • getDependentSprites

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDependentSprites()
        Get all sprites that affect or being affected by the current sprite
